snippet: The long-term survival of monarch butterflies may be in doubt.
abstract: Editorial observes that the complexity of the monarch butterfly's life cycle is mirrored by the complexity of the threats it faces; notes that the number of existing monarchs reached nearly catastrophic lows in 2009-2010 and has barely recovered since; maintains that the plight of monarchs underscores the dilemma of human behavior, and of living in a world of unintended consequences of mankind's own making.
lead_paragraph: The long-term survival of monarch butterflies may be in doubt.
